books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath is called in when a missing terrorism suspect drowns off the Italian coast.
books.name: USE OF FORCE

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: An expert on serial murder becomes involved in the hunt for a New York City killer who leaves a playing card at the crime scene.
books.name: MURDER GAMES

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A 19th-century British duke's daughter, disinherited by her half brothers, flees to Paris to make an unconventional new life.
books.name: THE DUCHESS

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: A collection of Outlander short fiction.
books.name: SEVEN STONES TO STAND OR FALL

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Complications in the lives of identical twins who were raised by their divorced parents, one on Nantucket, one on Martha’s Vineyard.
books.name: THE IDENTICALS

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: The men of the Sisterhood investigate the shady dealings of a drug-trafficking front.
books.name: HIGH STAKES

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: In this psychological thriller by the author of “The Girl on the Train,” drowned women are found in an English river town.
books.name: INTO THE WATER

books.author: by ﻿Imbolo Mbue
books.description: The American Dream meets the class divide in a tale of West African immigrants finding their footing.
books.name: BEHOLD THE DREAMERS

books.author: by RaeAnne Thayne
books.description: A techie forms a new family when a schoolteacher starts caring for his half brother.
books.name: SERENITY HARBOR

books.author: by Sarah MacLean
books.description: In the third installment in the Scandal and Scoundrel series, a duke in desperate need of an heir turns to his estranged wife.
books.name: THE DAY OF THE DUCHESS

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Years after she was kidnapped, a woman returns to her family’s Montana ranch.
books.name: COME SUNDOWN

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY
